pages.text: A specially prepared crafting area consists of a Grove Stone and a Fey Crafter.$(p)The Grove Stone itself must be activated using a sufficient $(info) $(l:spells/spell_grove_supplication)Supplication$() spell, and, when activated, will draw in fey particles to itself and occasionally grow grass or flowers.

Once activated, a Grove Stone can power any number of Fey Crafters within $(info) 10 blocks.$(p)The crafter itself requires five ingredients to produce the desired result, and must be activated with a $(l:apparatus/knives)knife.$()$(p)Items are produced instantly atop the crafter, or an adjacent inventory if provided.
